sentences.sContent: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.sCn: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.sContent: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.sCn: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

sentences.sContent: ...Why do state art councils help sponsor local arts and crafts festivals...
...State art councils help sponsor local arts and crafts festivals which draw crowds of tourist consumers...
...McDonald's should not have been allowed to sponsor the World Cup...

remMethod.val: spon(看作spoon， 勺子) ＋ sor(…者) → 举勺子的人 → 发起者

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranOther: someone who officially introduces or supports a proposal for a new law
